Name: Abyss Healer
Text: You may only have up to four cards with 'HEAL' in a deck.

Name: Fullbau
Text: AUTO: When a card named 'Blaster Javelin' rides this unit, search your deck for up to one card named 'Blaster Dark', reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

Name: Phantom Bringer Demon
Text: ACT [R]: [Counter Blast 1 & Choose two of your «Shadow Paladin» Rear-guards, and retire them.] Search your deck for up to one card named 'Phantom Blaster Overlord', reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

Name: Apocalypse Bat
Text: AUTO [R]: [Soul Blast 1] When this unit boosts a card with 'Blaster' in its name, you may pay the cost. If you do, the boosted unit gets power +6000 until end of that battle.

Name: Blaster Javelin
Text: CONT [V]: If you have a card named 'Fullbau' in your soul, this unit gets power +2000.

AUTO: [Choose a grade 3 «Shadow Paladin» from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on Rear-guard circle, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one card named 'Phantom Blaster Dragon', reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

Name: Darkside Pegasus
Text: AUTO: When this unit is placed on Rear-guard circle, choose another of your «Shadow Paladin», and that unit gets power +2000 until end of turn.

Name: Dark Shield, Marc Lir
Text: CONT: Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with 'Sentinel' in a deck.)

AUTO: [Choose a «Shadow Paladin» from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on Guardian circle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your «Shadow Paladin», and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.

Name: Doranbau
Text: AUTO [R]: When this unit boosts a unit named 'Blaster Dark', the boosted unit gets power +4000 until end of that battle.

Name: Gururubau
Text: AUTO [R]: When this unit attacks a Vanguard, if you have a «Shadow Paladin» Vanguard, this unit gets power +2000 until end of that battle.

Name: Nightmare Painter
Text: AUTO: When this unit is placed on Vanguard or Rear-guard circle, if you have a «Shadow Paladin» Vanguard, choose up to 1 «Shadow Paladin» from your hand, and put it into your soul.

Name: Witch of Nostrum, Arianrhod
Text: ACT [V/R]: [Rest this unit & Choose a card from your hand, and discard it] Draw a card.

Name: Blaster Dark
Text: CONT [V]: If you have a card named 'Blaster Javelin' in your soul, this unit gets power +1000.
AUTO: [Counter Blast 2] When this unit is placed on Vanguard circle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponents Rear-guards, and retire it.

Name: Cursed Lancer
Text: AUTO [V/R]: When this units attack hits a Vanguard, if you have a «Shadow Paladin» Vanguard, choose a card from your damage zone, and turn it face-up.

Name: Darkness Maiden, Macha
Text: AUTO: [Counter Blast 2] When this unit is placed on Vanguard or Rear-guard circle, if you have a «Shadow Paladin» Vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one grade 1 or less «Shadow Paladin», call it to Rear-guard corcle in the same column as this unit, and shuffle your deck.

Name: Demon World Castle, Donnerschlag
Text: CONT [V/R]: If you do not have a unit named 'Phantom Blaster Dragon' or a unit named 'Blaster Dark' on your Vanguard circle, this unit gets power -5000.
AUTO [V/R]: When this unit attacks, this unit gets power +2000 until end of that battle.

Name: Demon World Castle, Fatalita
Text: AUTO: When this unit intercepts, if you have a «Shadow Paladin» Vanguard, this unit gets shield +5000 until end of that battle.

Name: Knight of Nullity, Masquerade
Text: AUTO [R]: When this unit attacks, if you have a Vanguard with 'Blaster' in its name, this unit gets power +3000 until end of that battle.

Name: Moonlight Witch, Vaha
Text: AUTO [V/R]: [Counter Blast 2] When this units attack hits, if you have a «Shadow Paladin» Vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.

Name: Skull Witch, Nemain
Text: AUTO: [Counter Blast 1 & Choose a «Shadow Paladin» from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on Rear-guard circle, if you have a «Shadow Paladin» Vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw two cards.'

Name: Triple Dark Armor
Text: AUTO [V/R]: [Choose another «Shadow Paladin» Rear-guard, and retire it] When this unit attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this unit gets power +4000 until end of that battle.'

Name: Dark Mage, Badhabh Caar
Text: AUTO: When this unit is placed on Vanguard or Rear-guard circle, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a «Shadow Paladin», call it to Rear-guard circle, and if it is not, shuffle your deck.

Name: Dark Metal Dragon
Text: AUTO [V]: When this units drive check reveals a «Shadow Paladin», this unit gets power +2000 until end of that battle.'

Name: Demon of the Silver Spear, Gusion
Text: ACT [V/R]: [Counter Blast 2] This unit gets power +4000 until end of turn.

Name: Knight of Purgatory, Skullface
Text: AUTO [V]: At the beginning of your main phase, Soul Charge 1, and this unit gets power +2000 until end of turn.
AUTO [V/R]: [Soul Blast 8 & Counter Blast 5] When this units attack hits, you may pay the cost. If you do, retire all of your opponents Rear-guards.

Name: Phantom Blaster Dragon
Text: CONT [V]: If you have a card named 'Blaster Dark' in your soul, this unit gets power +1000.
ACT [V]: [Counter Blast 2 & Choose three of your «Shadow Paladin» Rear-guards, and retire them] This unit gets power +10000/Critical +1 until end of turn.

Name: Phantom Blaster Overlord
Text: CONT [V/R]: If you have a non-«Shadow Paladin» Vanguard or Rear-guard, this unit gets power - 2000.
CONT [V]: If you have a unit named 'Phantom Blaster Dragon' in your soul, this unit gets power +2000.

AUTO [V]: [Counter Blast 3 & Choose a 'Phantom Blaster Overlord' from your hand, and discard it.] When this unit attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this unit gets power +10000/Critical +1 until end of that turn.

Name: Origin Mage, Ildona
Text: AUTO [V] Limit Break 4 (This ability is active if you have four or more damage): [Counter Blast 2 & Choose two of your «Shadow Paladin» Rear-guards, and retire them] When this unit attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw two cards, and this unit gets power +3000 until end of that battle.
AUTO [V]: When this unit attacks a Vanguard, this unit gets power +3000 until end of that battle.

Name: The Dark Dictator
Text: CONT [V]: Your units cannot boost this unit.
CONT [V]: During your turn, this unit gets power +2000 for each of your «Shadow Paladin» Rear-guards.

AUTO: [Soul Blast 3] When this unit is placed on Vanguard circle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two of your «Shadow Paladin» Rear-guards in your front row, and those units get power +5000 until end of turn.
